name: huemongus
description:
Huemongus is a tiny game that will test your color perception and flash memory.

Huemongus is free, but if you enjoy the game consider donating or purchasing another of my games!
♥ ♥ ♥ 
https://www.buymeacoffee.com/fermenter

How to play:
  • A random color will flash at you: Memorize it!
  • Adjust the sliders below to match the original color as best as you can.
  • Submit fast to beat the clock!
  • Good matches reward time back.
  • How high can you score? :)
